dcterms:description: The MUSDB18 dataset is comprised of 150 songs, each of which was recorded at a 44.1-kHz sampling rate. It consists of two subsets ('train' and 'test'), where we further split the train set into 'train' and 'valid' as defined in the official 'musdb' package. For each song, the mixture and its four sources, i.e., bass, drums, other and vocals, are available.
dcterms:title: MUSDB18
